text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Dominion Energy Midstream Partners Lp :
* DOMINION ENERGY MIDSTREAM PARTNERS LP - MAY OFFER, SELL COMMON UNITS REPRESENTING LIMITED PARTNER INTERESTS IN CO NOT EXCEEDING $500 MILLION Source text:( bit.ly/2FcKYnq ) Further company coverage:
